methodology_notes.stationarity_test: ADF on original series; if non-stationary, differencing according to d in best (p,d,q) and ADF retested.
methodology_notes.model_selection: Grid search on small (p,d,q) ranges using AIC minimization.
methodology_notes.forecast: Point forecast with 95% confidence intervals via statsmodels get_forecast.

methodology_notes.returns_construction: Log returns of non-zero monthly counts, scaled by 100.
methodology_notes.model: GARCH(1,1) with normal innovations; variance and volatility forecast for horizon.

methodology.time_series_setup: Monthly resample (MS), zero-fill missing months; counts per tag
methodology.arima: Grid search over p∈[0..3], d∈[0..2], q∈[0..3] minimizing AIC; ADF tests pre/post differencing; residual diagnostics (Ljung-Box, Jarque-Bera); simple holdout backtest for MAE/RMSE/MAPE
methodology.garch: GARCH(1,1) on log-returns of non-zero counts, ADF on returns; ARCH-LM test; residual diagnostics; volatility forecast
methodology.vibe_index: Min-max normalize popularity and volatility across candidates; non-linear volatility penalty vol_norm = 1 - (vol_raw^gamma × (1 - reward_dampen × pop_nrm)); composite = weighted average of pop_nrm and vol_norm
